document.full_text: a milan court cleared citigroup, bank of america, deutsche bank and morgan stanley of market-rigging in a high-profile trial related to the 2003 collapse of food giant parmalat.
document.title: big banks cleared of market-rigging in parmalat case
lines_and_colors: a milan court cleared citigroup, bank of america, deutsche bank and morgan stanley of market-rigging in a high-profile trial related to the 2003 collapse of food giant parmalat.
